snippet: Dr. Thomas R. Frieden, the nation’s top public health official, will probably face withering questions about his record during a congressional hearing.
abstract: Dr Thomas R Frieden, director of Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and nation’s top public health official, has become face of Obama administration's flawed response to Ebola in United States; Frieden is likely to face withering questions about his record during a congressional hearing.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear, Julie Hirschfeld Davis and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Thomas R. Frieden, the nation’s top public health official, will probably face withering questions about his record during a congressional hearing.

headline.main: C.D.C. Director Becomes Face of Nation’s Worry and Flawed Response
headline.print_headline: C.D.C. Director Becomes Face of Nation’s Worry and Flawed Response

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
